question: SBI has to set how many digital branches "sbiINTOUCH" across the country?
explanation: SBI has set up 60 digital branches, called 'sbiINTOUCH', across the country. SBI has set up these branches in partnership with Dimension Data, a global technology integrator and managed services provider. The digital branches aim to help SBI expand its reach with increasing profitability. It will offer services like instant loan approvals, assistance in choosing investment portfolios.
